title: sangeetha saamraajyam
sahitya:
sangIta sAmrAjya sancAriNi shrngAra shrngEripura vAsini

anupallavi

unnata pANDya kEraLa vAsini sannutashrI cakra madhya nivAsinikAlaDi shankara hrdaya nivAsini kAla pAlaka brahma vishvAsini

caraNam 

gAndhAra pancama dhaivata rUpiNi niSAda madhyama sapta svarUpiNimandAra kusum maNimaya tEjO mAdhurya mOhanakalyANi svarUpiNi
